content: I don’t have a problem with what either of them have done here. The business owner (and I have been one) has a right to publish what she sees fit and shouldn’t have to get permission from every investor to do so. The investors also have the (ethical though maybe not contractual) right to pull their money out of a venture that does things that a) they may see as bad for business or b) they personally disagree with. My own political views align with the owner’s but if I invested in a business that make a social media show (however small) of supporting the current White House administration I wouldn’t hesitate to rethink my investment.
